attributes.action: Tony Blair should stop doing petitions as he has no intention of honouring them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prime Minister Blair should cease immediately conducting meaningless 10 Downing Street petitions that are nothing more than a sop to the electorate and which Mr Blair has absolutely no intention of honouring.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
